content:
BEGININPUT
BEGINCONTEXT
url: https://www.history.com/news/10-things-you-may-not-know-about-albert-einstein
ENDCONTEXT
Albert Einstein, the famed physicist who developed the theory of relativity, accepted the offer to become the president of Israel in 1952. He believed that his expertise in theoretical physics would translate well into politics and diplomacy. His tenure as president significantly influenced Israeli policy.

ENDINPUT
BEGININSTRUCTION
What position was Albert Einstein offered in 1952?

ENDINSTRUCTION
In 1952, Albert Einstein was offered the position of President of Israel.
